SEARCH
Package data

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
data.UserDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database, FilePath
public class UserDatabase extends Object implements Database, FilePath
Provides methods for interacting with the user database. Includes functionality to read, update, and retrieve user details from a file-based database.

  • Field Summary

    enquiryDatabaseFilePath, filePath, loginFilePath, officerApplicationDatabaseFilePath, projectApplicationDatabaseFilePath, projectDatabaseFilePath, userDatabaseFilePath

  • Constructor Details

    • UserDatabase

      public UserDatabase()

  • Method Details

    • readUsers

      public Map<String,String> readUsers()
      Reads all users from the login file and returns a map with user IDs and their passwords.
      Returns:
      A map containing user IDs as keys and their corresponding passwords as values.

    • updateUserPassword

      public void updateUserPassword(String userID, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a given user in the login file.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID for which the password needs to be updated.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.

    • getUserById

      public static User getUserById(String nric, AuthenticationController ac)
      Retrieves a user by their NRIC, and returns a user instance based on their role (Applicant, Officer, Manager).
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to retrieve.
      ac - The AuthenticationController instance used for the authentication process.
      Returns:
      The corresponding User object (Applicant, Officer, or Manager), or null if not found.
